It is required to harmonize the definition and the representation of the dimensional tolerance with AP 214 and AP 224.

ARM entity Location _dimension is mapped to the resource entity dimensional _location (Part 47), which represents the relative location between a pair of shape aspects. However, the following two attributes, origin and target, may be a geometric_ representation_ item, such as Axis _placement.origin: the element that is the origin for the Location_dimension. target: the element that is the target for the Location_dimension. Confirm the consistency with the dimensional _location in Part 47.
